author: Reuters Staff
title: China's yuan eases, but basket index rises to 5-1/2-year high - Reuters
description: The Chinese yuan eased to a three-week low against a firmer dollar on Thursday, while its value against the currencies of major trading partners touched a fresh 5-1/2-year high.
content:
By Reuters Staff
(Adds details, comments and background)
